name: Eric Cruz
text: Tried the beyond meat sausage pizza. Was pretty amazed on the quality and taste of the plant based sausage. Would be better if I could build my own pizza with it in any size instead of large only. Maybe in the future

text: I had extremely bad experience and called customer service plus entered online.  I was assured I would be called back by someone and given some compensation or free coupon. It’s been 5 days & haven’t been contacted!!!

name: Life With Jackie
text: My order took an hour to get to my house.  I don’t know how to add a picture to my review but the wings I just received were barely warm and VERY soggy. I tried to call the store 2 times and the call center answered both times and they tried to transfer me to the Gordon Drive store and they never answered.

name: joe mcalexander
text: Pizza is subpar but depending on coupons or current deals it can be cheap enough to become worth while. Some of the crust flavoring options are fairly good but in general the crust leaves alot to desire. Toppings are pretty standard as far as fast food pizza goes. Sauce could use some improvement, maybe a Spicier option or something.

name: Eric Lockridge
text: Grab a take out personal pan pizza for lunch or on the way home. Usually call order, drive there, and it's ready! Always great pizza!

text: I have pics but ordered a bacon extra cheese medium... I got a bacon chicken beef onion pizza burnt... the replacement pizza they sent had huge chunks of fat wasnt even fully cooked.... seriously are you kidding me

text: We got the buffalo mild wings, alfredo pasta, and Hershey's brownie. It was all just okay. The wings didn't really have any heat to them. The alfredo pasta was okay, it didn't have a lot of flavor. The brownie didn't have a lot of chocolate flavor, but the parts with the chocolate chips were good!
